subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Buehrle’s record against the Yankees improved to 2-14 in 22 starts after the Blue Jays won on Wednesday, more than 11 years after Buehrle’s last win over the Yankees.
snippet: Mark Buehrle’s record against the Yankees improved to 2-14 in 22 starts after the Blue Jays won on Wednesday, more than 11 years after Buehrle’s last win over the Yankees.
